subtitleNullable: Football matches, players & events for EURO 1960-2024 & Nations League 2019-2023
descriptionNullable:
**Dataset will be updated during EURO 2024**
**You may support this project via the upvotes button** ## Description The dataset contains all players & coaches, all matches & results, and main match events in Football/Soccer UEFA European Championship/EURO (1960-2024), and Nations League (2019-2023). * `matches`: * `euro`: `1960.csv` ... `2024.csv` - all EURO matches. * `nations`: `2019.csv`, `2021.csv`, `2023.csv` - all Nations League matches. * `friendly_2021-2024.csv` - all friendly matches from 2021 to 2024. * `qualifying_1960-2024.csv` - all qualifying matches from 1960 to 2024. * `logos` - contains flags of associations * `euro_coaches.csv` - all coaches from 1960 to 2024 * `euro_lineups.csv` - all players from 1960 to 2024 * `euro_summary.csv` - table includes basic information about each EURO. ## Related Datasets - [Football - FIFA Men's World Cup, 1930 - 2022](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/piterfm/fifa-football-world-cup) - [Football - FIFA Women's World Cup, 1991 - 2023](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/piterfm/football-fifa-womens-world-cup-1991-2023) ## Table columns ## Updates 2024-06-16 - add lineups & coaches; add associans flags folder.
2024-06-09 - add friendly, qualifying & Nations League matches.
title: Football - Soccer - UEFA EURO, 1960 - 2024
